mapper.select: select fpt.funding_id AS page_id, fpt.funding_name AS page_title, ut.name AS user_name, CONCAT( IF(NOW() < fpt.end_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), fpt.end_date), '종료'), '일' ) AS event_status, sum(if(ft.funder_id is null, null, rt.reward_price)) as total_reward_price, fpt.main_img_url AS img_url from funding_page_tb fpt left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = fpt.user_id) left outer join reward_tb rt on(rt.funding_id = fpt.funding_id) left outer join funder_tb ft on(ft.reward_id = rt.reward_id) group by page_id, page_title, user_name, event_status
